name: Onironauta
description: What would you do if you were trapped in your own mind? Simple graphical adventure about a lucid dream.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 2,0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce FX 5300 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes:
